pages.text:
Perfect for Tournaments and Prizes! YOUR LOGO PRINTED FOR FREE!
SAGE/PPAI/ASI Members click here
Vegas Golf "On The Course" Golf Gambling Game
Vegas Golf is an “
On The Course Gambling Game
” that is fun and easy for all levels of golfers from beginners to experts. The Original Game Now Includes:  9 Real Casino style Poker Chips, Velvet Chip Pouch, Gift Box and Instructions.
We also offer our High Roller 15 chip Edition.
VIEW ONLINE DEMO
. Vegas Golf has been
voted Best Golf Premium
and
Best Golf Fundraiser
(see Fundraiser program below).
Vegas Golf is an item that is used over and over again. We offer
FREE custom imprinting of your LOGO
on the back of 8 of the main chips.
Contact us for pricing.
NEW Vegas Golf NEED BEER GOLF TOWEL
This is also an extremely popular item!  Your logo is printed in the middle and/or on the back of the entire towel.  Comes with our popular Beer Chip Game.
NEW Vegas Golf STOGIE HOLDER!
Introducing the Vegas Golf
Stogie Holder
! The ultimate accessory for the
cigar aficionado
on the golf course! This innovative product is designed to securely hold your cigar while you focus on your swing. Your full color logo is printed in place of Vegas Golf logo.  Beautifully packaged. 24(pcs) minimum for custom logo
Our newest addition is our 2 ounce
Golf Ball Flask
!  T
he perfect golf gift for the golfer who has everything. This unique flask is crafted from 3 authentic golf balls, it’s sure to turn heads and bring laughs while you enjoy your favorite drink on the course.  Beautifully packaged and comes with a free funnel. Full color logo is printed on the back of the middle ball. We can even print a different logo on each ball along with custom packaging.
The NEED BEER Golf Towel is a crowd favorite!  This towel can be customized in the middle section as well as full graphics and logo on the back.  Golfers love this item during a tournament especially when playing our Free Beer Chip Game on the course. Comes with a free Beer Chip. Every Par3 whoever has the worst tee shot gets the chip and must buy a round when the Beer Cart comes.
Lighten Up Your Golf Event with Vegas Golf’s Cigarette Golf Tees
If you’re looking for a golf giveaway that’s guaranteed to
turn heads, spark laughs, and get people talking before they even tee off
—look no further than the
Vegas Golf Cigarette Golf Tees
.
These aren’t your ordinary tees. They’re a hilarious twist on a classic golf essential, packed inside a
custom cigarette-style box
that golfers will never forget. Whether you’re hosting a tournament, corporate outing, or charity event, this is the kind of promo item that sets your event apart from the rest.
What’s Inside the Pack?
Each pack delivers more than just laughs—it’s loaded with quality and customization options that golfers will actually use:
10 Premium 83mm Eco-Friendly Bamboo Tees
– Designed for
max distance
off the tee box.
1 Custom Printed Poker Chip Ball Marker
– A free bonus inside every pack!
Fully Customizable Packaging
– Add your logo to the cigarette box, tees, and poker chip.
Optional Business Card Insert
– Slip in your info for the ultimate branded handout.
Take It Over the Top – Cigarette Girls & All
Want to really crank up the excitement? Imagine your custom packs being served to golfers on a
vintage-style cigarette girl tray
as they pull up to the first tee. You’ll have golfers cracking up before their round even begins—and raving about your event long after the last putt drops.
Why Golfers Love Them
Golfers don’t just laugh—they actually
use
these. The tees are high-quality bamboo, the poker chip marker is practical, and the box becomes a collectible keepsake. It’s the perfect mix of humor and function that makes your event (and your brand) unforgettable.
Perfect for Promotions, Tournaments & Giveaways
If your goal is to stand out, the Vegas Golf Cigarette Tees are the perfect play. They’re funny, functional, customizable, and unlike anything else on the course. Watch the smiles, hear the laughs, and know your brand just scored a hole-in-one in the memory department.
Our products are unique, fun and bring lots of laughs on the course. These items are never lost and are used over and over again.
VEGAS GOLF RECEIVES AWARD FOR GOLF FUNDRAISER OF THE YEAR!
Here is how our game can raise $5000 during an average fundraiser tournament of 144 golfers:
Each player receives a Vegas Golf game in the golf cart (which has the sponsor or tournament logo on the back of every chip)
Have a fundraiser representative welcome each foursome as the pull up to the first tee.
Example: “Thank you for coming out to support Breast Cancer today. Each of you has received a complimentary Vegas Golf Game.
Only one game is needed for each foursome.
Would one of you take it out and decide as a foursome how much your group will be wagering per chip. We will be writing down each foursome along with your wager.
We would like each foursome to donate all of the negative chips (Water, Trees, Sand, 8-Ball, 3-Putt) to Breast Cancer. Whoever ends up with these chips at the end of 18 holes….please do not pay the other players! Once all of the foursomes are back at the clubhouse we will announce each foursome. At that time whoever ended up with the donated chips (Water, Trees, Sand, 8-Ball, 3-Putt) please come up with the money you would have paid each of the other players and give it to the Breast Cancer representative.
” A FUN WAY TO RAISE ADDITIONAL MONEY FOR THE CHARITY!”
THERE IS NO OTHER GOLF PREMIUM THAT ACTUALLY MAKES THE CHARITY MORE MONEY THAN THE ACTUAL PREMIUM ITSELF WHILE HAVING FUN ON THE GOLF COURSE
. (Example: If just the negative chips were donated to charity (could add the positive ones too) and each wager was only at $10.00 per chip …..that means each foursome would end up giving the charity $150.00 per foursome! Don’t forget each player gets to keep his or her own game with the sponsor/charity imprinted on the back of every chip to be used time and time again!
Additional Idea to raise even more money:
(In order to get the wagers up….the organizers do a silent auction at the first tee.
Example:
The representative would say “The top 3 foursomes with the highest wager per chip receive a gift certificate to the Country Club, dinner for two at Charlies, movie tickets, etc..” They get this at no charge from various sponsors for the charity event and it helps up the wager of each foursome in the name of the charity).
OTHER FUNDRAISER IDEAS
to incorporate: For large events that have a beer sponsor…have the beer company sponsor the new BEER Chip by putting their logo and image on the back. Beer Chip Rule: Every par three …the furthest from the pin on the opening drive….gets the Beer Chip. ) This means when the beer cart comes by..that person is buying! The back of the Beer Chip would have image of the sponsoring beer company with a message underneath TIME TO BUY US A CORONA!
Call us for free mockups.  Sample packs also available.  772-359-0377

Be the first to know about new collections and exclusive offers.

About Us
Welcome to Vegas Golf: Where Fun Meets Fairways! At Vegas Golf, we’re not just a manufacturer; we’re inventors and creators of everything fun on the golf course. Our mission is to elevate the game of golf by infusing it with the exhilarating elements of fun, camaraderie, and a little bit of friendly competition. Whether you're a seasoned golfer or just stepping onto the green, we have something for everyone. From our engaging Vegas Golf Games to innovative products like the Golf Ball Stogie Holder we are here to ensure that laughter and enjoyment accompany every round!
